- Added missing Auth type import in customAuth.ts
- Added missing Firestore type import in customAuth.ts
- These missing types caused TypeScript compilation errors that broke login functionality

Additional Improvements:
- Created /admin redirect route pointing to /admin-access
- Created /firebase-test diagnostics page for troubleshooting
- Added comprehensive TROUBLESHOOTING.md guide

- The getAuthSafely() function referenced Auth type without importing it
- The getFirestoreSafely() function referenced Firestore type without importing it
- This caused silent runtime failures in production

- Login page submit button would fail silently
- Admin login would not work
- No clear error messages to users
